backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing gallery items, messages, timeline data, user profiles, and interactive content with access control and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking edit‑content functionality to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing multiple frontend files’ purposes, styling, routing, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and light/dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root div and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all main site routes wrapped in the shared layout.
frontend/src/components/DraftReviewSumma: Dashboard-style summary showing gallery and message counts with loading states and last-loaded timestamp.
Generic drag‑and‑drop list component that updates order locally and commits changes on drag end.
frontend/src/components/EditGuard.tsx: Edit access wrapper enforcing Internet Identity login and profile setup before showing children.
frontend/src/components/editors/Dedicati: Editor for viewing and updating the final dedication title and message with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/editors/GalleryE: Manages gallery items including upload, captioning, deletion, and drag-and-drop reordering.
frontend/src/components/editors/Interact: Editor for configuring quiz questions and flip cards with full CRUD and validation before saving.
frontend/src/components/editors/LoveMess: Handles adding, editing, deleting, and reordering love messages with form controls and mutations.
frontend/src/components/editors/Timeline: Editor for creating, deleting, and reordering timeline milestones including date input and optional photo upload.
frontend/src/components/FlipCard.tsx: 3D flip card component toggling between front and back content with rotation animation.
Image carousel with next/previous controls, captions, and selectable thumbnails.
frontend/src/components/HeartParticles.t: Generates floating animated heart particles positioned randomly on the screen.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout states and displays a status-aware auth button.
frontend/src/components/LoveQuiz.tsx: Interactive quiz component with scoring, answer validation, and a results screen.
frontend/src/components/MessageEnvelopeC: Expandable card that opens a modal to display a full love message with title and content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user for their name and saving the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/PublishingCallou: Callout explaining how to publish the site and provides a copy-to-clipboard helper message.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Top-level layout including background pattern, navigation, main content, and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with links, icons, mobile menu, and login button integration.
frontend/src/components/SurpriseReveal.t: Component that toggles between a surprise button and a revealed message with animations.
frontend/src/components/TimelineMileston: Displays a timeline milestone with expandable details and optional photo, formatted by alternating layout.
frontend/src/components/ValentineSurface: Reusable styled container component that wraps children with card-like styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing it on identity change and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditMutations.ts: Provides React Query mutations for editing gallery items, love messages, and other content via the backend actor, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and status through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch user profile and all editable content types through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color variables, animations, and themed utility classes for the app’s styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, sets up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main app.
frontend/src/pages/EditContentPage.tsx: Admin page with tabbed editors for gallery, messages, timeline, dedication, and surprise content, wrapped in edit permissions.
frontend/src/pages/FinalDedicationPage.t: Displays the final dedication message with loading state and styled presentation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main landing page with a hero section, background image, heart particles, and a grid of navigation cards.
frontend/src/pages/InteractiveSurprisePa: Displays interactive surprises including a reveal, quiz, and flip cards loaded from configuration.
frontend/src/pages/LoveMessagesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays sorted love messages in a grid, showing loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/MemoriesGalleryPage.t: Loads and displays a sorted gallery of memory items with a carousel and fallback empty state.
frontend/src/pages/TimelinePage.tsx: Shows a chronological list of timeline milestones with a vertical timeline layout and loading/empty handling.
frontend/src/utils/authzError.ts: Parses authorization-related errors and provides user-friendly error messages based on common patterns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, feature requests, and metadata for the editing-permissions feature work.
